attributes.action: Stop Water Authorities charging Cathedrals as Businesses. They are Charities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a well supported 'Dont drain us' campaign to get Ofwat to recognize Cathedrals like Winchester as Charities - not as businesses. Because of their size the business tax would be unfairly large and lead to closing the Cathedral and a great National furore in all Cathedrals and churches.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
